
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(unittester-all)
target_compile_options(unittester-all PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_link_libraries(unittester-all PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  library-cpp-resource
  yt-server-master
  yt-server-cell_balancer
  yt-server-clock_server
  yt-server-controller_agent
  yt-server-discovery_server
  yt-server-exec
  yt-server-http_proxy
  yt-server-job_proxy
  yt-server-log_tailer
  yt-server-master_cache
  yt-server-node
  yt-server-rpc_proxy
  yt-server-scheduler
  yt-server-timestamp_provider
  yt-server-tools
)
target_link_options(unittester-all PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)
target_sources(unittester-all PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/config_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/8a8382a18083988df754644fce9e5fe3.cpp
)
add_test(
  NAME
  unittester-all
  COMMAND
  unittester-all
)
set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-all
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)
set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-all
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-all
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)
resources(unittester-all
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/8a8382a18083988df754644fce9e5fe3.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/controller-agent.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/http-proxy.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/map_reduce_spec.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/map_spec.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/master.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/node.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/reduce_spec.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/rpc-proxy.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/scheduler.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/sort_spec.yson
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/all/unittests/data/vanilla_spec.yson
  KEYS
  /configs/controller-agent.yson
  /configs/http-proxy.yson
  /configs/map_reduce_spec.yson
  /configs/map_spec.yson
  /configs/master.yson
  /configs/node.yson
  /configs/reduce_spec.yson
  /configs/rpc-proxy.yson
  /configs/scheduler.yson
  /configs/sort_spec.yson
  /configs/vanilla_spec.yson
)
target_allocator(unittester-all
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-default
)
vcs_info(unittester-all)
